title: 105_hr2600
content: The text chunk discusses the repeal of incentive payments for reducing the number of medical education residents and the elimination of payment authority for a demonstration project in New York. It also mentions payment offsets. The text chunk addresses the non-retroactive application of ESRD Secondary Payer Interpretation and extends COBRA continuation coverage for End Stage Renal Disease Medicare beneficiaries for 36 months. Section 4980B(f)(2)(B)(iv) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to extend COBRA continuation coverage for End Stage Renal Disease Medicare beneficiaries for 36 months. Amendments are also made to ERISA to address the non-retroactive application of ESRD Secondary Payer Interpretation. Amendments are made to the Social Security Act and the Public Health Service Act to extend benefits under title XVIII for qualified beneficiaries, excluding those under section 226A, for a period of 36 months. Amendments to the Social Security Act extend Medicare benefits for qualified beneficiaries under title XVIII to 36 months, excluding those under section 226A.
